title: San Diego/Point Loma-Ocean Beach
name: Ranchos Natural Foods
content: Creative Mexican food with an eye towards organic and healthy options.  Many vegetarian and vegan options, though the extensivity of the menu caters to every meat-lover's Mexican food dreams.  Ample portions, casual service, smoothies and juices and organic salad bar available.  Popular, but large enough to handle its crowds except at prime weekend times.
